overview: Races, chases and things on fire; treat yourself to a bucketload of Top Gear's attempts to get melted, hurt or drowned.  To more cries of "How hard can it be?", "That’s not gone well" and "You insufferable Oaf!", Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May gallantly risk humiliation in another series of magnificent challenges, where petty rivalries are taken much too far…
title: Top Gear: The Challenges 2
